statements: SELECT * FROM crime_data WHERE crime_id = 1
SELECT crime_type, crime_location FROM crime_data WHERE crime_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT crime_id, crime_type FROM crime_data ORDER BY crime_id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT crime_type FROM crime_data
SELECT crime_location FROM crime_data WHERE crime_type LIKE '%assault%'
SELECT * FROM crime_data ORDER BY crime_type DESC, crime_date ASC
SELECT crime_id, crime_type FROM crime_data WHERE crime_location = 'New York'
SELECT crime_id, crime_date FROM crime_data WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery' AND crime_location LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT crime_type, crime_location FROM crime_data WHERE crime_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT DISTINCT crime_location FROM crime_data
SELECT * FROM crime_reports;
SELECT report_id, crime_type, report_date, location FROM crime_reports;
SELECT location, report_date, crime_type FROM crime_reports WHERE crime_type = 'Theft';
SELECT hotspot_id, location_name, crime_rate FROM crime_hotspots ORDER BY crime_rate DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location_name, last_updated FROM crime_hotspots WHERE crime_rate > 0.5;
SELECT report_id, report_date, crime_type, location FROM crime_reports;
SELECT location, report_date, crime_type, report_id FROM crime_reports;
SELECT hotspot_id, location_name, crime_rate, last_updated FROM crime_hotspots;
SELECT location_name, hotspot_id, last_updated, crime_rate FROM crime_hotspots;
SELECT report_id, location, crime_type, report_date FROM crime_reports;
SELECT * FROM crime_reports;
SELECT report_date, crime_type FROM crime_reports;
SELECT location, description FROM crime_reports WHERE crime_type = 'Theft';
SELECT * FROM crime_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT patrol_required, hotspot_id FROM crime_hotspots WHERE crime_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM crime_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT report_id, crime_type, location FROM crime_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM crime_reports WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery' AND location LIKE '%Main Street%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM crime_reports;
SELECT officer_name, precinct, shift FROM patrol_officers WHERE shift = 'Night Shift';
SELECT * FROM crimes ORDER BY crime_date DESC;
SELECT crime_id, crime_type FROM crimes WHERE crime_location = 'New York';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM crime_reports;
SELECT c.*, ch.location_name FROM crimes c JOIN crime_hotspots ch ON c.crime_id = ch.reported_crime_count;
SELECT ch.hotspot_type, cs.strategy_name FROM crime_hotspots ch JOIN crime_strategies cs ON ch.hotspot_id = cs.related_hotspot_id;
SELECT * FROM crimes;
SELECT crime_type, crime_date FROM crimes WHERE crime_type='Theft';
SELECT c.crime_id, c.crime_type, c.crime_date, r.report_description FROM crimes c INNER JOIN crime_reports r ON c.crime_id = r.crime_id;
SELECT ch.location_name, ch.hotspot_type, ch.reported_crime_count, cs.strategy_name FROM crime_hotspots ch LEFT JOIN crime_strategies cs ON ch.hotspot_id = cs.related_hotspot_id;
SELECT MAX(reported_crime_count), MIN(reported_crime_count), AVG(reported_crime_count) FROM crime_hotspots;
SELECT * FROM crimes;
SELECT id, crime_type, crime_date FROM crimes WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery';
SELECT id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM crime_locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT report_date, crime_id, location_id FROM crime_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, analysis_date, crime_id, analysis_results FROM crime_analysis WHERE crime_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM crimes ORDER BY crime_date DESC;
SELECT crime_type, location FROM crimes JOIN crime_locations ON crimes.location = crime_locations.id WHERE crime_locations.location_name = 'Downtown';
SELECT count(crime_id) AS total_crimes, location_id FROM crime_reports GROUP BY location_id ORDER BY total_crimes DESC;
SELECT c.crime_type, a.analysis_results->>'trends' AS crime_trends FROM crimes c JOIN crime_analysis a ON c.id = a.crime_id;
SELECT * FROM crime_strategies WHERE strategy_description IS NOT NULL;
